name: chip-away
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text.black_white: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
